title: Super Bowl do's and don'ts & uniform talk with Chris Long
itunes:title: Super Bowl do's and don'ts & uniform talk with Chris Long
description:
Dave Dameshek is solo in Studio 66 but joined via Skype by our old pal Chris Long! Shek and Long kibitz about a bunch of stuff including getting arm sleeve tattoos, his dad's acting career, why defense has bested offense in Super Bowl history (12:10), the best looking NFL team of all-time, Super Bowl do's and don'ts (26:44), Hall of Fame snubs and the best and worst Super Bowl uniform match ups (46:37).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
